summary: This is an email from an Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated August 10, 2019, providing staff rosters for Thursday, Friday, and Saturday. It lists the Morning Watch Officers and Lieutenants, and is significant as it relates to the period when Jeffrey Epstein was incarcerated at MCC New York prior to his death.

persons.name: T. Noel
persons.context: Listed as one of the Morning Watch Officers in the staff roster email from the Associate Warden at MCC New York.

events.title: Staff Roster Distribution
events.description: An Associate Warden at MCC New York emails staff rosters for Thursday, Friday, and Saturday, listing the Morning Watch Officers and Lieutenants.

locations.name: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York
locations.address: 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
locations.context: The federal detention facility where the email originates and where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated August 10, 2019, from an Associate Warden at MCC New York regarding staff rosters.
It lists Morning Watch Officers T. Noel and I. (initials only), and references Morning Watch and Day Watch Lieutenants (names not provided in the excerpt).
This correspondence relates to the operational staffing at MCC New York around the time of Jeffrey Epstein's incarceration and death in August 2019.
